name: Rex Splode
type: Veo3 Ultra-Realistic Character — Actor in Costume

physical_specifications.build: Athletic–muscular frame — thicker deltoids, fuller chest (~54 inches), broader upper back with visible lat sweep, deeply cut obliques, and stronger legs (powerful quads/hamstrings, rounded glutes). Waist tapered to ~30 inches. Muscles read clearly under suit compression with realistic fiber definition; veins faintly visible on forearms during motion.
physical_specifications.posture: Upright and confident; shoulders set down-and-back; subtle forward lean when engaged.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Balanced heroic proportions; slightly longer arms; forearms emphasized by padded glove design.

facial_structure.face_shape: Square with strong, defined jawline and high cheekbones.
facial_structure.cheekbones: High and pronounced, catching light for natural contour.
facial_structure.nose: Straight bridge, medium width, slightly rounded tip.
facial_structure.mouth: Broad with full lips; natural confident curve.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Warm tan with subtle golden depth (HEX #A9745A), balanced blend reflecting mixed heritage; healthy sun-kissed glow under daylight.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth, even complexion with realistic pore detail and light sheen under key lighting.
facial_structure.beard_stubble: Light 12–24 hour stubble along jawline and upper lip; slightly uneven density for realism; individual strands clearly visible in close-up shots.
facial_structure.lips_detail: Natural lip texture with fine vertical lines; slight dryness along the lower lip edge; soft natural sheen without gloss effect.

eyes.sclera_detail: Subtle red veins for authenticity; wet specular reflection in inner corners; avoids overly bright or flat white.
eyes.catchlight: Single softbox catchlight from camera-left for natural depth and realism.

hair.length_cut: Long on top (~8 inches) gathered fully into a neat man bun at the crown; sides trimmed short (~1 inch).
hair.style: Full man bun with smooth wrap, no loose flyaways; clean undercut fade on sides.
hair.texture: Thick, straight, healthy strands with subtle natural wave.
hair.root_variation: Slightly darker roots for depth; individual strand separation visible at hairline.
hair.flyaways: A few fine, natural flyaways near temples and bun for realism.
hair.scalp_visibility: Subtle scalp visibility at part; avoids painted or overly perfect look.

costume.material: High-grade matte stretch composite; subtle honeycomb microtexture in yellow panels; deep red panels in smooth compression weave.
costume.gloves: Brown leather fingerless combat gloves, padded with visible stitching and realistic creasing.
costume.boots: Dark brown leather tactical boots with angular reinforced plates, knee-high with strap closures.
costume.utility_belt: Slim brown leather with low-profile functional pouches.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

char_spec.aperture: f/2.8–f/4 for shallow depth of field
char_spec.framing_default: Medium-long (knee-up), podium slightly offset, 70% of body visible

material_shading.skin: PBR shading with roughness 0.45–0.55; subtle specular on forehead and nose
material_shading.fabric: Matte with micro-roughness variation; avoids uniform gloss
material_shading.leather: Semi-matte with irregular specular highlights; visible edge wear

voice_style.note: Young, cocky edge; slightly breathy onset; tighten brightness by 5% to avoid metallic timbre; add mild prosody variation (±8% rate, ±20 cents pitch).

char_spec.performance_notes: Behaves like a celebrity actor at all times. Confident, cocky eductive, yound, edgy
char_spec.veo3_do_not: Do NOT render outlines or inked edges., Do NOT use flat cell shading; use realistic light falloff and global illumination., Do NOT remove skin texture or stubble detail.

voice_style: Target: Jason Mantzoukas as Rex performance — raspy high‑energy tenor; cadence fast, aggressive; ~170 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; don’t shout; keep intelligible.
